title: Win a cycling trip to Flanders
content:
Cyclist
Win a cycling trip to Flanders

Thanks to Cycling in Flanders, you can win a two-night stay for you and a ride partner in Oudenaarde, plus entry to the Centrum Ronde van Vlaanderen, bike hire and a return on LeShuttle if you’re driving.

All you need to do it fill out the form below and answer the following question:

What is the time limit for the Flandrien Challenge?

A. 24 hours
B. 72 hours
C. 96 hours

Are you up for the Flandrien Challenge?


1. This prize is valid for UK entrants only and entrants must be aged 18 and over.
2. Only one entry per person will be accepted.
3. A winner will be chosen at random and contacted after the competition closes. The winner must accept the prize within 14 days of the prize being offered.
4. The prize consists of a trip to go cycling in Flanders for two people, including a return transfer with LeShuttle from Folkestone to Calais, bike hire (if necessary), entry to the Tour of Flanders Centre, two night’s accommodation in a twin or double-bedded room in Oudenaarde (including breakfasts) and one dinner for two people at a restaurant in Oudenaarde.
5. The prize does not cover the cost of petrol, other travel costs within Belgium, food and drink, personal expenditure or incidental costs, other than where mentioned in the prize package list, above.
6. It is the responsibility of the winner to ensure they have valid passports, travel and car insurance to cover the duration of the trip.
7. The prize is non-negotiable, non-transferable and non-refundable. No cash alternative is available. Travel must be completed by 31 December 2026.
8. The prize is subject to availability and must be booked at least one month in advance of the desired travel dates. Travel dates are subject to availability. Once confirmed, the booking cannot be amended in any way.
9. Employees of Diamond Publishing, the Metropolis Group and VISITFLANDERS are not eligible to enter.
10. The information, including personal data, which entrants submit to enter the competition, will be used to announce and contact the winner.
11. To the extent permitted by applicable law, the publisher and VISITFLANDERS shall not be liable under, or in connection with, these terms and conditions and reserve the right to withdraw the competition if required due to unforeseen circumstances.
